DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether hydration intravenous saline match urine output , use device RenalGuard superior standard hydration saline prevent contrast-induced nephropathy .
DOC.brief_title: RenalGuard System Prevention Contrast Induced Nephropathy
DOC.criteria: serum creatinine > 1.2mg/dl glomerular filtration rate ( GFR ) < 60ml/min acute renal failure use radiological contrast late 7 day Current use Nacetylcysteine hydration sodium bicarbonate Patients dialysis Emergency procedure
